properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 2 at 2:38PM CST until February 2 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron.

* 20 Foot Winds...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph.

* Relative Humidity...As low as 5 to 7 percent.

* Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 4

* Timing...Critical fire weather conditions are expected to
develop around 11 AM this morning and continuing until around
7 PM this evening.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will
create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid
activities that promote open flames and sparks.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE WESTERN OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE
